casebody.data:
HANESBRANDS INC.
v.
Kathleen FOWLER. No. 438A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 12, 2016. David C. Pishko, Winston-Salem, for Fowler, Kathleen. Robin E. Shea, Winston-Salem, for Hanesbrands Inc. Jill S. Stricklin, Winston-Salem, for Hanesbrands Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of January 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of January 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 19th day of February 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
